item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) on X
item.description:
It’s innovation season! Fresh out of Piltover’s forges, @PapaSmoothie and John present patch 5.2: Hex Rift!
Coming July 18th: 💥NEW RIFT 👊New champions ⚙️Lotsa Hextech!!
… and more
▶️ WATCH NOW: https://t.co/7ApfjBgKam
